    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Budget
    Represents a budget for a specific category in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    BudgetControllerFactory
    Factory for creating BudgetController instances for a specific user.
    BudgetReminder
    Represents a budget reminder in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    BudgetReminderControllerFactory
    Factory for creating BudgetReminderController instances for a specific user.
    BudgetReminderService
    Service for validating and creating BudgetReminder objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    BudgetService
    Service for validating and creating Budget objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    BudgetStorage
    Storage class for Budget objects for a specific user in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    CLI
    CLI is the command-line interface for Flossy Personal Finance Manager.
    Controller<T>
    Generic controller for managing CRUD operations on a specific type in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    Expense
    Represents an expense entry in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    ExpenseControllerFactory
    Factory for creating ExpenseController instances for a specific user.
    ExpenseService
    Service for validating and creating Expense objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    ExpenseStorage
    Storage class for Expense objects for a specific user in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    GUI
    GUI is the graphical user interface for Flossy Personal Finance Manager.
    IController<T>
    Interface for controllers in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    IControllerFactory<T>
    Interface for controller factories in Flossy.
    Income
    Represents an income entry in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    IncomeControllerFactory
    Factory for creating IncomeController instances for a specific user.
    IncomeService
    Service for validating and creating Income objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    IncomeStorage
    Storage class for Income objects for a specific user in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    IReminder
    Interface for reminders in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    IService<T>
    Interface for validation services in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    Main
     
    Notification
    Holds a list of triggered reminders and provides notification messages in the Flossy system.
    PaymentReminder
    Represents a payment reminder in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    PaymentReminderControllerFactory
    Factory for creating PaymentReminderController instances for a specific user.
    PaymentReminderService
    Service for validating and creating PaymentReminder objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    ReminderListener
    Observes reminders, checks if they are triggered, and adds them to notifications in the Flossy system.
    ReminderStorage
    Storage class for Reminder objects for a specific user in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    UltraSimpleStorage<T>
    Abstract class for file-based storage of serializable objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    User
    Represents a user in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    UserController
    Specialized controller for user authentication and management in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    UserControllerFactory
    Factory for creating UserController instances with the correct service and storage.
    UserService
    Service for validating and managing users in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
    UserStorage
    Storage class for User objects in the Flossy Personal Finance Manager system.
